class SXF_ElemApertureHash : public SXF_ElemBucketHash

Interface

Public Members
SXF_ElemApertureHash()
virtual int index(const char* key) const

Description

The ElemApertureHash class implements an aperture bucket hash. SXF Aperture attribute keys are "x", "y", and "shape".

Member Description

enum Attributes

SXF_ElemApertureHash()

Constructor.

virtual int index(const char* key) const

Map an attribute key to its enum value. Return a corresponding enum value or -1.
